ico_data.short_desc: Band Protocol offers a decentralized data oracle by making data readily available to be queried on-chain, using delegated proof of stake ("dPoS") to ensure data integrity

status_updates.description:
⛳️ Band Protocol is thrilled to share our community update for January! We share our major milestones including 1,000,000 oracle requests on BandChain, technical improvements as well as our partners launching $BAND integrations into production.

Official announcement 👉  https://medium.com/p/538bd1f8b2a1/
Spread the word 👉 https://twitter.com/BandProtocol/status/1356587693057077248

🚀  CoinMarketCap, the world’s most-referenced price-tracking website for cryptoassets, has partnered with Band Protocol to complete integration of their enterprise-grade crypto data into the Band Standard Dataset and support BandChain Phase 2 by commercializing their API through premium oracle scripts.

Official announcement 👉  https://medium.com/p/c8e66afc932b/
Spread the word 👉 https://twitter.com/BandProtocol/status/1359869819948994568

👨‍💻 Band Protocol is proud to join OpenAPI Initiative as the first blockchain firm alongside Google Cloud, IBM, eBay, Bloomberg and Microsoft among others, to connect blockchain applications to common Application Programming Interfaces (API) and streamline the exchange of data between smart contracts and off-chain data sources.

Official announcement 👉  https://medium.com/p/a8d2b14354f9/
Spread the word 👉 https://twitter.com/BandProtocol/status/1338505282096300038

🚀 Brave New Coin, the leading data and research company backed by Techemy Group, has strategically partnered with Band Protocol to bring institutional-grade price data for up to 1500+ digital assets onto the $BAND decentralized oracle network.


Official announcement 👉  https://medium.com/p/f4e6bc68347f/
Spread the word 👉  https://twitter.com/BandProtocol/status/1330813006293344259

LunaDEX, Swingby & Linear Finance partner with Band Protocol integrating bands customized decentralized oracles into their projects

https://www.reddit.com/r/bandprotocol/comments/jv4zvm/lunadex_swingby_linear_finance_partner_with_band/

⛳️ Band Protocol is proud to publish our community update for the month of October! In the recap, we cover the successful mainnet upgrade, notable updates on BandChain and oracle scripts as well as nine partnership developments for the month.

Official announcement 👉  https://medium.com/bandprotocol/4493e15c67b0
Spread the word 👉 https://twitter.com/BandProtocol/status/1323246510604128258

🚀 Komodo, the blockchain industry's first open composable smart chain platform, has integrated $BAND for scalable price oracles into their flagship product AtomicDEX - a secure wallet and non-custodial decentralized exchange.

Official announcement 👉  https://medium.com/bandprotocol/3904e68f1a96
Spread the word 👉 https://twitter.com/BandProtocol/status/1321031486397542400
